# RF Event Listener

Extendable event listener for RedForester API.

[PyPI package](https://pypi.org/project/rf-event-listener/)

## Development

Install dev requirements:

```bash
pip install -e .[dev]
```

Lint
```
flake8 --max-line-length=120 examples rf_event_listener tests
```

Run tests
```
pytest
```
